metadata.dc:description: Annual mean composite of Copernicus PPI. Returns a single band RasterCube.
metadata.dc:comment: Given a year and area of interest, returns an annual mean composite of PPI. Seasonal Trajectories (ST) product is a filtered time series of Plant Phenology Index (PPI) provided yearly on a 10-daily basis at 10m resolution . It is part of the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service (CLMS), pan-European High Resolution Vegetation Phenology and Productivity (HR-VPP) product suite. The Seasonal Trajectories PPI is derived through fitting a smoothing and gap filling function to the yearly time-series raw PPI values generated from Sentinel-2 satellite observations. In addition to the PPI band, a QFLAG band indicating the quality of the smoothing process is included. The Seasonal Trajectories provide the vegetation status for each pixel on a regular 10-day time step from January 1 2017 onwards over the EEA39 region.
metadata.im:notes: PPI dataset is processed in OpenEO (https://github.com/integratedmodelling/OpenEO-UDP-UDF-catalogue/blob/main/UDP/UDP_annual_avg_PPI_10m.py). Given a year and area of interest, returns a mean composite of PPI.
metadata.dc:title: Annual mean composite of Copernicus PPI
